description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Sidescrolling Platform game. Use your parkour skills to jump across buildings, dodge planes and rockets while escaping the cops! Many different modes of gameplay! Challenge a friend in multiplayer mode! Try challenge mode and submit your score to see who is the most Professional Stealer !
